text: Not all women want to have children, and that ’ s perfectly OK. While “ normal ” people are pressured by friends and family to get pregnant, celebrities are pressured by the whole world. And compared to other celebs, nobody has been more publicly pressured than Jennifer Aniston. The world is obsessed with her having a baby! MORE : JENNIFER ANISTON ’ S AND JUSTIN THEROUX ’ S DOG CUSTODY BATTLE It seems like no one has been reported pregnant more times than Jen. The earliest reports date back to 1999, back when the world first fell in love with her on Friends and she began dating Brad Pitt. Since 1999 there have been more than 55 published articles about her being pregnant both in and outside the
